text: Bad Wurzach is a spa town in Ravensburg in Baden-Württemberg in Germany. == Twin towns == Bad Wurzach is twinned with: * Luxeuil-les-Bains, France, since 1988 * Wallingford, England, United Kingdom, since 2000 * Popielów, Poland, since 2000 * Saint Helier, Jersey, since 2002 == References == Category:Spa towns in Germany Category:Ravensburg (district)
title: Bad Wurzach
